body:
## What's Changed
* Container util: remove C++20 std algorithms by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1671
* allocate table by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1633
* backport __pairs metamethod to our tweaked version of Lua by @ChrisFloofyKitsune in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1615
* Drop library directories from install by @p2004a in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1688
* Make portable install default and set dirs correctly by @p2004a in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1689
* CMake Cleanups by @p2004a in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1696
* Fix scar TTL tags by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1476
* Remove unused vector `GuiHandler::buildcolors` by @rhys-vdw in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1717
* `string::find == 0` → `starts_with` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1716
* Publish site docs from master by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1709
* Port fix to sol's optional::emplace for clang++ 19 by @p2004a in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1715
* Fix #709, cleanup old docs by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1708
* Add float3::GetNormalized by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1705
* Expand the CEG operators article by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1699
* Add reclaimer to unitdestroyed by @keelefi in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1669
* Delete Buildbot by @12345swordy in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1666
* Fix numBounce -1 not being unlimited by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1658
* Implement Normalize_Vector by @12345swordy in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1642
* Remove unused lua functions by @12345swordy in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1664
* setcameratarget must change camera controller by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1645
* Add a named constant for 1/GAME_SPEED by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1595
* allow streaming small sound file by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1576
* Fix #1647, add some docs to Lua API by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1648
* use futex directly instead of via syscall on OpenBSD by @rfht in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1621
* Add weapon def tag, `windup` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1581
* Remove singletons from audio stream by @dzosz in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/857
* Check quadfield size modrule properly by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1587
* Add booleans for the different phases of DrawWorldPreParticles callin by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1570
* Add `Spring.ForceUnitCollisionUpdate` for stale collisions by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1021
* Apply the #1595 change to code from #1581 by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1721
* Remove slimsig lig, replace SDL event handling with a simple loop, fix RML input handlers piling up on game reloads by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1719
* Add new Docker based build system by @p2004a in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1730
* update README branch reference by @n-morales in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1734
* Fix saving state after /iconshidewithui by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1743
* Restore missing `Spring.GetFeatureSelectionVolumeData` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1735
* fix bugger off issues by @lostsquirrel1 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1694
* Add UnitConstructionDecayed call-in by @keelefi in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1631
* Fix https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/issues/1552 by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1603
* Implement animated flipbook style textures for weapon projectiles. by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1617
* Save and restore metalMap. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1745
* Fix Game.cpp two draws per minute when minimized. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1741
* Give game mechanics lower weapon def IDs by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1720
* Remove bitops.h and replace with C++20 <bit> by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1331
* NPOT and float textures are now mandatory. It's not 2008 anymore. by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1747
* Don't assert on external data by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1560
* Adding name constants for LuaSyncedCtrl.cpp and LuaSyncedRead.cpp by @12345swordy in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1541
* Look up water level instead of hard coding 0 by @Jordan-Cottle in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1484
* Modrule reading: set defaults consistently internally by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1588
* End game graph/log scale by @John-194 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1368
* Don't warn for unlinked `Script.LuaXYZ` calls by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1352
* Check if synced RNG calls are executed in SYNCED_CODE by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1455
* implement lua unit script multi-calls by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1527
* Dolly camera by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1649
* Add Windows build script by @wu1274704958 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1524
* Minimum camera zoom distance for spring and overhead cameras by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1569
* camera handler must remove observer on kill by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1750
* Use cmake import targets part 1 by @n-morales in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1737
* add stringify functions to vector and matrix by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1748
* Remove `tdfID` weapon def by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1467
* Add new 'm' character to texture options, which disables trilinear filtering  by @Beherith in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1218
* Maybe fix #1756 by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1757
* Another attempt at #1756 by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1759
* update dockerfile installed cmake version to 3.27 by @n-morales in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1763
* Bump cmake version to 3.27 and fix headless linking to GLEW by @n-morales in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1762
* Add sample shading for MSAA (better quality) by @bcdrme in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1765
* dollycam should respect the los when tracking units by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1767
* Migrate DebugColVol drawing to modern GL by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1768
* force RMLUI_TRACY_CONFIGURATION to fix generate issues with tracy by @n-morales in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1773
* Fix linux fontconfig by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1771
* Take radar error into account inside SelectCircleUnits. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1753
* Out of map orders leniency by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1769
* Should not GuiTraceRay for quads beyond the floor until the far plane. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1754
* time spring dampened transition mode would erroneously rotate when changing camera controllers by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1780
* fix switching from rot camera to ta camera by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1784
* Switch over to WinAPI to get the date of file modification. by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1788
* ArchiveScanner Improvements by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1792
* Fix crash related to not found glyphs. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1789
* Fix GuiTraceRay for radardrift by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1764
* Fix FileSystemAbstraction::IsPathOnSpinningDisk on Linux by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1795
* Add misc.windChangeReportPeriod (in seconds) modrule... by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1712
* Add /debugquadfield to draw quadfield related information (v2). by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1794
* Fix units failing to adjust to terrain slope when not turning. by @lostsquirrel1 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1797
* Annotate our NIH flat_set for the future by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1791
* Another take on archive scanning splash screen by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1798
* Fontconfig: Make init and teardown more robust. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1793
* `Spring.AllocateTable` -> `table.new` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1803
* allow skipping the factory move command insertion by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1539
* Fontconfig windows workaround v2 by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1809
* Allow negative index at GetUnitCurrentCommand to index from queue end. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1813
* Stablize sorts used by path finders by @lostsquirrel1 in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1805
* Don't preload glyphs for non-alphanumeric fonts. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1806
* Apply radar error to lua spatial queries. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1811
* Add Spring.GetUnitCommandCount for getting a units command queue count. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1814
* Tracy zones2 Add further once-per-frame zones, colorize top-level zones consistently by @Beherith in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1198
* Fallback fonts with atlas clearing. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1790
* RmlUI Context handling improvements by @ChrisFloofyKitsune in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1761
* Add `tracy.LuaTracyPlot` and `tracy.LuaTracyPlotConfig` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1651
* Add trace ray ground Lua functions by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1706
* Get rid of `CMD_AISELECT` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1729
* Dollycam zero transition time by @loveridge in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1838
* Reduce copy-paste in skirmish AI resource interface implementation by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1325
* Tooltip resource packs + layout tweak by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1328
* Make Cannon respect srcPos on HaveFreeLineOfFire. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1852
* Add Spring.SetProjectileTimeToLive. by @saurtron in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1858
* Fix `widgetHandler:FontsChanged` by @sprunk in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1860
* Preparation for the release by @lhog in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1861

## New Contributors
* @rhys-vdw made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1717
* @Jordan-Cottle made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1484
* @John-194 made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1368
* @wu1274704958 made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1524
* @bcdrme made their first contribution in https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/pull/1765

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/beyond-all-reason/spring/compare/spring_bar_%7BBAR105%7D105.1.1-2590-gb9462a0...2025.01.6
